thread.section_title: Saatva Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatva Mattress | saatvamattress.com
thread.title: Steve Dennehy
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Steve Dennehy

author: Steve Dennehy
title: Steve Dennehy
text:
Recently received 11.5" Luxury firm King to replace our 34 year old super firm box spring mattress. I really didn't know mattresses only lasted 10 or so years. Except for back pain, which I didn't blame on the mattress, it looked and felt fine.
Well, these things sure have come a long way in 34 years. Definitely softer on the top than our old one but very supportive throughout. After a few minutes of laying on it you feel as if it has enveloped your entire body and provided support to every surface. I woke up with no back pain after the first night, I never expected that.
I was hesitant ordering online but the reviews sold me plus I had recently done the same thing with a leather recliner from Casco Bay and that worked out great.
I would say that if you want a state of the art mattress, quick delivery, and a product of exceptional quality then order from Saatva!
